name: APM Configuration for WebSphere Application Server Template
description: This template will configure APM for IBM Application Server on Linux.

metadata.displayName: APM Configuration for WebSphere Application Server Template
metadata.longDescription: This template will configure IBM APM agents for WAS on a target node. APM Agents must have already been installed on this node with a minimal of the was and os agents installed. This template will configure the was agent on the target node.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description: Deployed on a single Linux node with APM and WebSphere already installed.

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description: IBM Cloud Application Performance Management Agent for WebSphere.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for APM - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSHLNR_8.1.3/com.ibm.pm.doc/welcome.htm
3. This integration template is run remotely on the Target Virtual Machine
4. This template will configure the was agent to all local WebSphere Servers.
